select u.*
,d.name as dormitoryname
from tb_platform_user u
inner join tb_dorm_dormitory_user du on du.userid = u.uuid inner join tb_dorm_dormitory d on du.dormitoryid = d.uuid
where u.bindid = #{platformUser.bindid}
and (u.uuid not in(select distinct du.userid from tb_dorm_dormitory_user du))
and (u.uuid in(select distinct du.userid from tb_dorm_dormitory_user du))
and du.dormitoryid = #{platformUser.dormitoryid}
and u.username like concat('%', #{platformUser.username}, '%')
and u.name like concat('%', #{platformUser.name}, '%')
and ( (#{platformUser.uuid} in (select ur.userid from tb_platform_user_role ur, tb_platform_role r where ur.roleid = r.uuid and (r.rolekey = 'WP_SUPER' or r.rolekey = 'SYSTEM_ADM')) ) or (#{platformUser.uuid} not in (select ur.userid from tb_platform_user_role ur, tb_platform_role r where ur.roleid = r.uuid and (r.rolekey = 'WP_SUPER' or r.rolekey = 'SYSTEM_ADM')) and not exists (select urn.* from tb_platform_user_role urn, tb_platform_role rn where urn.roleid = rn.uuid and u.uuid = urn.userid and (rn.rolekey = 'WP_SUPER' or rn.rolekey = 'SYSTEM_ADM')) ) ) order by u.username ;

select pu.* from tb_platform_user pu ,tb_platform_user_role ur, tb_platform_role pr where pu.bindid = #{bindid} and pu.uuid = ur.userid and ur.roleid = pr.uuid and pr.rolekey = #{role} and pu.status = 'NORMAL'

select u.* from tb_platform_user u,tb_wp_user_com uc where u.uuid = uc.userid and u.bindid = #{platformUser.bindid} and uc.communityid = #{platformUser.communityid} and (u.status = 'NORMAL' OR u.status IS NULL) and exists (select ur.* from tb_platform_user_role ur,tb_platform_role r where ur.roleid = r.uuid and ur.userid=u.uuid and r.rolekey=#{platformUser.title})
union select u.* from tb_platform_user u where u.bindid = #{platformUser.bindid} and (u.status = 'NORMAL' OR u.status IS NULL) and not exists (select uc.userid from tb_wp_user_com uc where uc.userid = u.uuid) and exists (select ur.* from tb_platform_user_role ur,tb_platform_role r where ur.roleid = r.uuid and ur.userid=u.uuid and r.rolekey=#{platformUser.title});

select pu.* from tb_platform_user pu ,tb_platform_user_role ur, tb_platform_role pr,tb_mtx_user_merchant um where um.merchantid = #{merchantId} and um.userid = pu.uuid and pu.uuid = ur.userid and ur.roleid = pr.uuid
and pr.rolekey in ('MTX_REPAIR_WORKER','HQ_SERVICE')
and pr.rolekey in ('MTX_MAINTAIN_WORKER','HQ_SERVICE')
union select pu.* from tb_platform_user pu ,tb_platform_user_role ur, tb_platform_role pr where pu.uuid = ur.userid and ur.roleid = pr.uuid
and pr.rolekey in ('MTX_REPAIR_WORKER','HQ_SERVICE')
and pr.rolekey in ('MTX_MAINTAIN_WORKER','HQ_SERVICE')
and not exists (select um.userid from tb_mtx_user_merchant um where um.userid = pu.uuid);

select h.uuid, h.name, count(s.uuid) as maintaincount, ifnull(sum(s.repairamount), 0) as totalamount from (select pu.* from tb_platform_user pu ,tb_platform_user_role ur, tb_platform_role pr,tb_wp_user_com uc where pu.bindid = #{bindid} and uc.communityid = #{communityid} and uc.userid = pu.uuid and pu.uuid = ur.userid and ur.roleid = pr.uuid and pr.rolekey = 'WP_REPAIR_WORKER' union select pu.* from tb_platform_user pu ,tb_platform_user_role ur, tb_platform_role pr where pu.bindid = #{bindid} and pu.uuid = ur.userid and ur.roleid = pr.uuid and pr.rolekey = 'WP_REPAIR_WORKER' and not exists (select uc.userid from tb_wp_user_com uc where uc.userid = pu.uuid)) h inner join tb_wp_suggestion s on h.uuid=s.maintainer where s.bindid = #{bindid} and s.communityid = #{communityid} and s.processid is null and s.finaltype = 'R' group by h.uuid order by h.uuid;

select u.*
,c.name as communityname, hlp.blknos as blknos
from tb_platform_user u
join (select * from tb_wp_user_com uc where uc.communityid = #{platformUser.communityid})hlp on u.uuid = hlp.userid left join tb_wp_community c on hlp.communityid = c.uuid
where u.bindid = #{platformUser.bindid}
and (u.uuid not in(select distinct uc.userid from tb_wp_user_com uc))
and ( (#{platformUser.uuid} in (select ur.userid from tb_platform_user_role ur, tb_platform_role r where ur.roleid = r.uuid and (r.rolekey = 'WP_SUPER' or r.rolekey = 'SYSTEM_ADM')) ) or ( #{platformUser.uuid} not in (select ur.userid from tb_platform_user_role ur, tb_platform_role r where ur.roleid = r.uuid and (r.rolekey = 'WP_SUPER' or r.rolekey = 'SYSTEM_ADM')) and not exists (select urn.* from tb_platform_user_role urn, tb_platform_role rn where urn.roleid = rn.uuid and u.uuid = urn.userid and (rn.rolekey = 'WP_SUPER' or rn.rolekey = 'SYSTEM_ADM')) ) );

select * from tb_platform_user u inner join tb_platform_user_role ur inner join tb_platform_role r where u.uuid = ur.userid and r.uuid = ur.roleid and r.rolekey = 'WP_EXPRESS' and u.bindid = #{bindId} and u.uuid in( select distinct uc.userid from tb_wp_user_com uc where uc.communityid = #{communityId} )
